src:
Jennifer Lawrence Pilih Bulan Madu di Sumba
06 Nov 2019, 11:02 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Jennifer Lawrence memilih Sumba, Indonesia, sebagai lokasi bulan madu usai menikah dengan Cooke Maroney pada Oktober 2019. (Matt Winkelmeyer/Getty Images/AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Jennifer Lawrence dikabarkan telah berangkat ke Sumba, Indonesia, sebagai lokasi bulan madu usai menikah dengan Cooke Maroney pada Oktober 2019.Menurut sumber People, bintang The Hunger Games tersebut berbulan madu di Nihi Sumba Resort, Sumba Barat, Nusa Tenggara Timur, Indonesia, yang terkenal sebagai resor eksklusif dan privat.Keduanya dikabarkan menyewa sebuah rumah privat dari pemilik resor tersebut, pengusaha Chris Burch. Rumah yang diberi nama Mendaka kerap dipesan dan digunakan oleh sejumlah selebritas dunia, salah satunya Christian Bale pada tahun lalu, kata sumber People.Sumber tersebut juga mengatakan bahwa JLaw dan Maroney dijadwalkan bakal mengelilingi desa warga Sumba di sekitar resor dengan menunggang kuda. Resor tersebut dibuka pada 2015 dan sempat disebut majalah Travel+Leisure sebagai resor terbaik pada 2017, yang mendongkrak aktivitas dan pemesanan hotel itu.Kedatangan Jennifer Lawrence dan Cooke Maroney ke Sumba ini menambah kunjungan seleb dunia selain Christian Bale. Sebelumnya, Nihi Sumba juga jadi lokasi pernikahan Brody Jenner dan Kaitlynn Carter. Meskipun kini keduanya telah berpisah.Pada 19 Oktober lalu, Jennifer Lawrence dan Cooke Maroney resmi menikah di Rhode Island. Pasangan tersebut mengadakan upacara pernikahan dengan dihadiri 150 tamu undangan termasuk Adele, Amy Schumer, Emma Stone serta Ashley Olsen.Menurut laporan People, Lawrence dan Maroney mengadakan resepsi pernikahan di Belcourt of Newport, sebuah mansion mewah di Rhode Island yang didesain pada 1894 oleh arsitek Amerika terkenal Richard Morris Hunt.Satu hari jelang pernikahan, Lawrence dan Maroney dilaporkan mengadakan makan malam yang dihadiri sejumlah kawan mereka termasuk Nicole Richie, Joel Madden, Cameron Diaz, dan Sienna Miller.



Pada September, Lawrence dan Maroney dirumorkan sudah menikah setelah majalah gosip Page Six menerbitkan sejumlah foto yang menampilkan pasangan tersebut terlihat berada di luar Biro Perkawinan Manhattan dengan beberapa dokumen yang terlihat resmi.Penggemar berkata kemungkinan Lawrence dan Maroney memilih menikah di pengadilan. Menilik pembawaan aktris Hunger Games yang tertutup soal kehidupan pribadi itu, kemungkinan tersebut bukannya mustahil.Sebelum menikah dan berbulan madu di Sumba Indoneisa, Jennifer Lawrence dan Cooke Maroney telah berkencan sejak Juni 2018 dan bertunangan pada Februari 2019. (end)
text:
Jennifer Lawrence Choose Honeymoon on Sumba
Nov 6 2019, 11:02 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Jennifer Lawrence chose Sumba, Indonesia, as the location of the honeymoon after marrying Cooke Maroney in October 2019. (Matt Winkelmeyer / Getty Images / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Jennifer Lawrence is said to have departed for Sumba, Indonesia, as a honeymoon location after marrying Cooke Maroney in October 2019. According to People's sources, the Hunger Games star honeymooned at Nihi Sumba Resort, West Sumba, Nusa Tenggara East, Indonesia, which is famous as an exclusive and private resort. Both are reportedly renting a private house from the resort's owner, businessman Chris Burch. The house named Mendaka is often reserved and used by a number of world celebrities, one of whom was Christian Bale last year, said a People source. The source also said that JLaw and Maroney were scheduled to surround the Sumba residents' villages around the resort on horseback. The resort opened in 2015 and was called the Travel + Leisure magazine as the best resort in 2017, which boosted the activities and bookings of the hotel. The arrival of Jennifer Lawrence and Cooke Maroney to Sumba added to world celebrity visits besides Christian Bale. Previously, Nihi Sumba was also the location of the wedding of Brody Jenner and Kaitlynn Carter. Although now the two have separated. On October 19, Jennifer Lawrence and Cooke Maroney were officially married in Rhode Island. The couple held a wedding ceremony attended by 150 invited guests including Adele, Amy Schumer, Emma Stone and Ashley Olsen. According to People's report, Lawrence and Maroney held a wedding reception at Belcourt of Newport, a luxury mansion in Rhode Island designed in 1894 by American architects famous Richard Morris Hunt. One day before the wedding, Lawrence and Maroney reportedly held a dinner which was attended by a number of their friends including Nicole Richie, Joel Madden, Cameron Diaz, and Sienna Miller.



In September, Lawrence and Maroney were rumored to be married after the gossip magazine Page Six published a number of photos showing the couple seen outside the Manhattan Marriage Bureau with some documents that looked official. Fans said the possibility of Lawrence and Maroney choosing to get married in court. Judging by the closed nature of the Hunger Games actress about personal life, this possibility is not impossible. Before getting married and honeymooning in Sumba Indonesia, Jennifer Lawrence and Cooke Maroney have been dating since June 2018 and engaged in February 2019. (end)
